visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bar chart with the title 'Honey Composition'. The chart should display the composition of honey in percentages, with series names 'Fructose', 'Glucose', 'Water', 'Maltose', and 'Other'. The chart should have custom colors, no visible x-axis and y-axis labels, and data labels rotated and positioned for better readability. The chart should also have a tooltip showing the percentage of each series.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a bar chart titled 'Honey Composition' with data representing the percentage composition of honey. The chart uses custom colors defined globally. The x-axis and y-axis labels are hidden, and the y-axis is set to start from 0. The tooltip displays the percentage of each series when hovered over. The bar chart is stacked in percentage mode, and data labels are enabled, formatted to show the series name and percentage, rotated for better readability, and positioned to avoid overlap. The chart is designed to be visually clean and informative, focusing on the composition data without unnecessary clutter.
